main event: On March 7, 1961, a small white object shaped like an interrogation mark was observed in British Columbia, moving fast and erratically before breaking into two pieces and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was described as small and white with a black center., The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes., The object was classified as unidentified despite possible explanations including a balloon or aircraft., The witnesses did not appear to be familiar with aircraft., The sighting was recorded in a Project Blue Book report indicating potential military interest.
sighted object: small white object shaped like an interrogation mark
witness description: Survey worker, age 27, in good health
